question: Which international association has banned to export plastic wastes to poorer countries?
explanation:
The European Union has recently announced that it has banned to export unsorted plastics to less industrialized nations outside the OECD.
The new rules amend the groupâ€™s 2006 Waste Shipment Regulation and under the rules effective from January 1 2021, Non-OECD nations could be sent clean, non-hazardous waste exports for recycling.
